title: Fontlab - snapping edge to corner point?
content:
Is there a way to snap the edge A of a diagonal contour to the point B of another contour? A feature like that would be useful for creating glyphs like "four", "seven", "K" etc.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023225340im_/http:/typophile.com/files/edge_to_point_4097.gif)
author: ghurman
